Welcome to Mini 1509!

Reviewed by: AngryPidgeon, Cogito Ergo Sum, and petroleumjelly


It's the day of the wedding! You're all dressed up nice. The floral decor is around, and you're all milling about when suddenly you hear a shriek! "MY DRESS, WHO DID THIS TO MY DRESS?" The bride storms out wearing her yellow dres- Wait, yellow? "It was fine 30 minutes ago before I took a shower." The usher walks over to her, and whispers into her ear. "Hmmmm, so you 13 are the only people who have been here all morning." She walks around, inspecting each and every one of you. "Well, I have no clue why any of you would do-" She falls over as one of her heels broke off. She inspects it and finds a clean cut. "Really, my heels are sawed too? BAH. You all are going to figure out who did it. Then, tell the usher to remove them."

Rules (stolen from fuzzybutternut)
Voting & Lynches
Please vote in bold (Vote: notscience) or use the vote tags (VOTE: notscience).
Please unvote in bold (Unvote:) or use the unvote tags (UNVOTE: ). You do not have to unvote before re-voting, but I would appreciate it if you did.
A lynch will occur when more than half the players are voting for someone.
A no-lynch will occur when half the players are voting for no-lynch.
Once a player is lynched, it will be twilight. You may still post until the death scene is revealed.
Once I post the death scene for a player, it turns to night.

Posting & Communications
I use the OOC tag on mod posts and when I edited a player's posts. Please do not use this tag.
You may PM me at any time and ask me anything (i.e. to get a rule clarification).
Do not quote PMs from me, especially Role PMs.
No out-of-thread-discussion is allowed unless I specifically allow it.
Do not edit or delete any of your posts.
No "bah" posts after you die. If you are dead, you stay dead until I have posted the final result of the game.

Activity & Deadlines
Each day will be about 3 weeks long.
Each night will be about 3 days long.
If at any point in the game a deadline is reached, and no player has enough votes to be lynched, then there will automatically be a no-lynch.
Players who have not posted for 72 hours will be prodded (via PM); players who do not post within 36 hours of a prod will be replaced. If you were to be prodded twice over a game Day or thrice over the whole game, you may be replaced at my discretion.
If you have declared V/LA, you may be exempted from prods during that time at my discretion.

Etiquette
Please try to avoid vulgar language. Cursing is fine, I really don't care, but don't purposefully offend someone.
NO AD HOMINEM.. Attack the post, NOT the poster.
Please do not make any personal attacks. I will not punish you if you do, but I would appreciate it if you don't.
Follow the rules.
Be mature.
Have fun!

Vanilla townie role PM
Welcome to Mini 1509!

You are a Vanilla Townie

You can use your vote during the day to help remove all threats.

You win when all threats to the town are eliminated, and at least one town-aligned player is alive.



Role PMs going out now. Please respond with your role name through PM to confirm.

Role PMs have been sent out. Day starts in 48 hours or when 11/13 have confirmed.
With 11/13 in, D1 has begun. DL is in 21 days. That is in (expired on 2013-11-04 16:30:00)

@Radiant, Short answer: No.

it's just sort of a case of knowing your audience and the game state. If I was town, I wouldn't have held it against you, probably just scolded you if it didn't work out. You took a lot of risks, but that's what a gambit is and it payed off here. You made it more difficult for the scum team. If Garruk was town, and the role set up wasn't as it was, you could've made it worse for the town later.
